thread.title: American Airlines Rolls Out First of its ‘Basic Economy’ Cheaper Tickets
thread.title_full: American Airlines Rolls Out First of its ‘Basic Economy’ Cheaper Tickets - WSJ

author: Susan Carey
title: American Airlines Rolls Out First of its ‘Basic Economy’ Cheaper Tickets
text:
American Airlines Group Inc., following a commitment it made in January following months of planning, said it has made available for sale cheaper economy-class fare options that come with passenger restrictions on 10 domestic routes.

The nation’s largest airline by traffic said the lower fares are available for travel starting March 1 on a variety of business and leisure routes from four of its domestic hubs. More cities will be...
